item.title: Larry Summers Reportedly Backs Scott Bessent, Says Treasury Secretary Right To Question Fed’s Overreach
item.description: The former Treasury Secretary said the Fed’s non-monetary activities should be subject to scrutiny by political officials.

item.title: This Crypto Firm Plans To Slash 7% Of Its Workforce: Report
